name: Stella
description: $STL is Cyberstella's game token which can be obtained through gameplay and through swapping in exchanges. $STL can be used to increase a player's Crew Rarity, perform Crew Scouting (minting), and perform Crew Limit Breaks. In the future, players can also directly purchase $STL tokens ingame via fiat (Debit/Credit Card) once that feature is implemented.
